title: Last of the Ninth
description: In 161AD, the new Emperor of Rome, Marcus Aurelius, faces conspiracy both from within the Empire and beyond. At its core, the annihilation of a Roman army and the disappearance of an operative with vital information. As two agents of the Imperial Secret Service journey to plumb the depths of intrigue, they confront ghosts of the past - their own, and that of the haunted Ninth Spanish Legion.
author: Stephen Lorne Bennett
